Traits.Name: Advanced Surveillance
Traits.Content: The officer gains advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks made to notice hidden or invisible creatures within 30 feet.

Traits.Name: Tactical Advantage
Traits.Content: When the officer is not surprised, they add +2 to their initiative rolls.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The officer makes two attacks: one with its Assault Rifle and one with its Tactical Strike.

Actions.Name: Assault Rifle
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage, plus 3 (1d6) electrical damage from the rifleâ€™s enhanced firing system.

Actions.Name: Tactical Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d6 + 4 + 2d6) slashing damage with a tactical knife and the target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated until the end of their next turn, representing the disorienting nature of the strike.

Actions.Name: Sonic Disruption Blast
Actions.Content: The officer deploys a sonic dispersal device in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 30 (4d12 + 4) thunder damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one. The officer can use this ability once per short rest.
